verses.roman:
dhuti pari' prabhu yadi piṇḍāte vasilā
sāta-kuṇḍī vipra tāṅra āgete dharilā

synonyms: dhuti pari'-putting on a new cloth; prabhu—Lord Nityānanda; yadi—when; piṇḍāte vasilā—sat on a high platform; sāta-kuṇḍī—the seven big, big earthen pots; vipra—the brāhmaṇa,; tāṅra āgete—in front of Him; dharilā—placed.
translation: After Nityānanda Prabhu had changed His cloth for a new one and sat on a raised platform, the brāhmaṇa brought before Him the seven huge pots.
